Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students communicating using a string telephone device.
The student can illustrate how the string telephone works over a distance by showing the string connecting the two people.
The student can depict that sound is used to send information through the string telephone.
The student can label the drawing with words or symbols to explain how sound travels through the string.
The student can show how communicating over the distance helps people by drawing or labeling.
The student can use only the materials provided in the drawing, such as cups and string, to demonstrate the construction of the string telephone.
